attributes.action: Allow 14-16 years olds in to council gyms/fitness suites with adult supervision
attributes.additional_details: Open gyms/fitness suites to teenagers aged 14-16 to go with an adult.
attributes.background:
At present children under 16 are not allowed in council gyms/fitness suites. The government are trying to reduce obesity and encourage exercise. 

We have 2 teenagers that love exercising. 1 who runs and wants somewhere safe and warm on dark winter nights.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for local councils

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
